availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert John Richard Tilton (Nicholas County, KY, clerk and physician)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, clerk and physician. Kentucky native. Son of Robert D. Tilton and Mirah J. Finley Tilton. Married to Annie E. Howe Tilton in on September 25, 1855. Father of Robert D. Tilton and Jennie Tilton. Clerk in Fleming County in 1850. Physician in Nicholas County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 1, p. 316B.
